ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
PyTao is wrapper on top of Tao and allow users to access the Tao library via ctypes or pexpect.
Tao is an open source general purpose program for charged particle and X-ray simulations in
accelerators and storage rings.
about.summary: PyTao is wrapper on top of Tao and allow users to access the Tao library via ctypes or pexpect.

commands: TAO_REUSE_SUBPROCESS=1 ACC_ROOT_DIR=$PWD/bmad pytest -v --pyargs pytao.tests -k "not help and not test_plot"

about.description:
PyTao is wrapper on top of Tao and allow users to access the Tao library via ctypes or pexpect.
Tao is an open source general purpose program for charged particle and X-ray simulations in
accelerators and storage rings.
about.summary: PyTao is wrapper on top of Tao and allow users to access the Tao library via ctypes or pexpect.

commands: TAO_REUSE_SUBPROCESS=1 ACC_ROOT_DIR=$PWD/bmad pytest -v --pyargs pytao.tests -k "not help and not test_plot"

name: pytao
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pytao" %}
{% set version = "0.5.7" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9a756638dc93f6d7fedc5f825976aa9911175177664ca35f56fab2f957d63055

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools_scm
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - bmad >=20250925
    - h5py
    - matplotlib-base
    - numpy
    - pexpect
    - pydantic >=2
    - tqdm

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - git
    - pytest
    - pytest-cov
    - bokeh
    - ipython
    - openpmd-beamphysics
  imports:
    - pytao
    - pytao.plotting
    - pytao.plotting.bokeh
  commands:
    # Add back once https://github.com/bmad-sim/pytao/issues/101 is resolved:
    # - pytao --help
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/pytao-gui  # [unix]
    - git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/bmad-sim/bmad-ecosystem bmad
    - echo | pytao -noplot -lat $PWD/bmad/bmad-doc/tao_examples/erl/lat.bmad
    - TAO_REUSE_SUBPROCESS=1 ACC_ROOT_DIR=$PWD/bmad pytest -v --pyargs pytao.tests -k "not help and not test_plot"

about:
  home: https://github.com/bmad-sim/pytao
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: PyTao is wrapper on top of Tao and allow users to access the Tao library via ctypes or pexpect.
  description: |
    PyTao is wrapper on top of Tao and allow users to access the Tao library via ctypes or pexpect.
    Tao is an open source general purpose program for charged particle and X-ray simulations in 
    accelerators and storage rings.
  doc_url: https://bmad-sim.github.io/pytao
  dev_url: https://github.com/bmad-sim/pytao

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hhslepicka
    - ChristopherMayes
    - ken-lauer
